channel.title: SoftLayer_Brand on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Brand on SoftLayer API

item.title: createCustomerAccount
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::createCustomerAccount Create a new customer account record. Overview Create a new customer account record. Parameters Name Type Description account SoftLayer_Account The template of the account object to be created. bypassDuplicateAccountCheck boolean Bypass validation for duplicate account(s). Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Account

item.title: createObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::createObject Create a new brand record. Overview Create a new brand record. Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Brand The SoftLayer_Brand object that you wish to create. Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Brand

item.title: getAccount
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getAccount Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_BrandInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_BrandObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Account

item.title: getAllOwnedAccounts
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getAllOwnedAccounts Retrieve all accounts owned by the brand. Overview Retrieve all accounts owned by the brand. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_BrandInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_BrandObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Account[]

item.title: getAllTicketSubjects
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getAllTicketSubjects Overview (DEPRECATED) Use [[SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject::getAllObjects]] method. Parameters Name Type Description account SoftLayer_Account Deprecated. Account is no longer required Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_BrandInitParameters Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Ticket_Subject[]

item.title: getAllowAccountCreationFlag
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getAllowAccountCreationFlag Retrieve this flag indicates if creation of accounts is allowed. Overview Retrieve this flag indicates if creation of accounts is allowed. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_BrandInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_BrandObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values boolean

item.title: getBusinessPartner
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getBusinessPartner Retrieve business Partner details for the brand. Country Enterprise Code, Channel, Segment, Reseller Level. Overview Retrieve business Partner details for the brand. Country Enterprise Code, Channel, Segment, Reseller Level. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_BrandInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_BrandObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Brand_Business_Partner

item.title: getBusinessPartnerFlag
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getBusinessPartnerFlag Retrieve flag indicating if the brand is a business partner. Overview Retrieve flag indicating if the brand is a business partner. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_BrandInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_BrandObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values boolean

item.title: getCatalog
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getCatalog Retrieve the Product Catalog for the Brand Overview Retrieve the Product Catalog for the Brand Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_BrandInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_BrandObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Product_Catalog

item.title: getContactInformation
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getContactInformation Retrieve the contact information for the customer account brand. Overview Retrieve the contact information for the brand such as the corporate or support contact. This will include the contact name, telephone number, fax number, email address, and mailing address of the contact. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_BrandInitParameters Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Brand_Contact[]

item.title: getContacts
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getContacts Retrieve the contacts for the brand. Overview Retrieve the contacts for the brand. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_BrandInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_BrandObjectMask SoftLayer_BrandObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Brand_Contact[]

item.title: getCustomerCountryLocationRestrictions
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand::getCustomerCountryLocationRestrictions Retrieve this references relationship between brands, locations and countries associated with a user’s account that are ineligible when ordering products. For example, the India datacenter may not be available on this brand for customers that live in Great Britain. Overview Retrieve this references relationship between brands, locations and countries associated with a user’s account that are ineligible when ordering products. For example, the India datacenter may not be available on this brand for customers that live in Great Britain.
